pkgmetadata.longdescription: enact will detect the proper resolution of your secondary monitor (if any) and automatically set it up as soon as you plug it in (or out). It uses xrandr under the hood and works great with window managers like i3, bspwm, and others. Use cases: - a laptop and an abritrary secondary monitor (e.g. at work, home, etc.) - a desktop with two monitors
